H0.text: Volcanoes are located along convergent and divergent plate boundaries.

H1.text: Mezas are located along convergent and divergent plate boundaries.

H2.text: Megaliths are located along convergent and divergent plate boundaries.

H3.text: Dunes are located along convergent and divergent plate boundaries.

A4.text: Most divergent plate boundaries are at the bottom of the oceans, and so most volcanic activity on Earth is submarine, forming new seafloor.

A5.text: Thus subduction zones are bordered by chains of volcanoes called volcanic arcs.
